name: tartans-from-different-sources
title: Tartans from different sources
description:
Tartan threadcounts retrieved from different public sources:
* [House of Tartan](http://www.house-of-tartan.scotland.net/)
* [Robert Bradford's database](http://www.weddslist.com/cgi-bin/tartans/pg.pl?source=rb)
* [Thomas Insel's database](http://www.weddslist.com/cgi-bin/tartans/pg.pl?source=tinsel)
* [Database by Jim McBeath & Joseph Shelby](http://www.weddslist.com/cgi-bin/tartans/pg.pl?source=x)
* [Patterns from the Scottish Tartans Society](http://www.weddslist.com/cgi-bin/tartans/pg.pl?source=sts)
* [The Laing Family Tartan; The Traill Family Tartan; Ruxton Tartans](http://www.weddslist.com/cgi-bin/tartans/pg.pl?source=misc)
author: Levko Kravets <levko.ne@gmail.com>
